title.rendered: What To Look for When Buying an Amazon Business with Ned Hakam of Umbrella Fund

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:04 — 34.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 38:04 — 34.9MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Ned Hakam is an 8-figure E-commerce seller and one of the partners at Umbrella Fund, an Amazon management company that buys and aggregates Amazon businesses. 

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The acquirer’s buyer’s perspective
  • The 7 categories for Umbrella Fund
  • Inventory management or restock process
  • How to manage inventory dynamically
  • The Customer base/subscription model
  • The other biggest way to add value to your company 
  • How to have a strategic plan for growing portfolio
